com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform

Class PostgresHistoryDdl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform.DbTriggerBasedHistoryDdl
      • com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform.PostgresHistoryDdl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlatformHistoryDdl

    public class PostgresHistoryDdl
extends DbTriggerBasedHistoryDdl
    Uses DB triggers to maintain a history table.
